weap id [weapon]: 139 (Greater Fear)
damage [dmg]: 10 Cause Fear (Type I)
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 5N to forge (N1)

This whip is made from the hair of one hundred rats that were enchanted by a Nature mage. Anyone struck by the whip will also suffer from overwhelming fear. Animals will be very reluctant to attack the wielder of the whip. It is also effective for keeping slaves in line.
